After Naruto ate his fill and was on his way the relief that his pleasant distraction offered was already fading fast. Determined yet again to find some way to alleviate. his boredom Naruto pressed on down the street.

All the villagers were happy to see him and the village was safe and he knew he should be grateful, and he was, but as he walked along Naruto couldn't help but wish for something to do or someone to fight. Eventually his mindless wandering led him to the training fields where he figured he may as well get in a work out. Creating an obscene amount of clones all of the Naruto's proceeded to undergo all sorts exercises. An hour or so of time had been killed training and when he released the jutsu he saw he'd amassed a small flock of fresh academy graduates watching him with starry eyes, Naruto blushed at this and waved to the group (of which several promptly fainted).

Naruto felt a bit dejected as all he'd really managed to do was make himself sore and sweaty, but vowing not to lose to something as lame as boredom Naruto pressed onward back into town. Passing through the gates Naruto had a rush of epiphany as he looked at the street before him. It was so obvious if he was bored he could just...

Having finally reached the answer he sought Naruto excitedly took off for the Inuzuka compound, in his excitement it only took him about a minute to reach as he decided it'd be more prudent to travel via rooftop. Landing at the residence's main entrance Naruto began furiously knocking and was met with, what felt like an eternity later, a loud shout from what sounded like Kiba "JESUS CHRIST I'M COMING!" Naruto wisely took that as the cue to stop knocking, and after what felt like another eternity Kiba finally opened the door, clad only in a tank top and boxer shorts with an obvious drool mark running down his face. "Well? What's the big emergency?!" Kiba asked exasperatedly "It better be good if it interrupted my nap..."

"Um...well...uh...I just thought I'd to see if you wanted to hang out" Naruto admitted.

"You suck." Kiba said.

"Sorry sorry I'll go an-" Naruto started.

"No, it's fine. Come in." Kiba grumbled. Naruto's heart momentarily fluttered as he briefly thought he'd screwed up his one opportunity, before he followed Kiba in. However the instant Naruto passed Kiba he said "Jeez man, you reek!" clutching his nose in agony.

"What?! No I don't!" Naruto retorted.

"Maybe not to your nose, but to me you smell like a pool of sweat and dirt." Kiba gagged.

"Oooooohhh," Naruto said dumbly "I worked out before I came over here, that must be it."

"Don't care. Get clean" Kiba muffled behind his hand.

"Wait? What?" Naruto asked.

"Down the hall, to the left. Shower. Use it." the Inuzuka managed.

"But I-"

"USE. IT." Kiba interrupted.

"Fine!" Naruto caved "You big baby!"

Turning the water off Naruto stepped out off the shower to find his clothes were gone "What the fuck?" Naruto said to himself as he wrapped himself in a towel. Less then thrilled with finding out how he "measured up" to Kiba, Naruto grumbled to himself "That ass-hat could have at least lent me a shirt." wanting desperately to think about anything else. Making his way back down the hallway he saw the bathroom door, check, followed by the next door which led to a nice looking bedroom, maybe Hana's? maybe Kiba's mother's? either way it was far to well kept to be Kiba's. The next door appeared to be quite scuffed and scratched, well that's not to strange considering they do raise ninja hounds, turning the knob Naruto was assaulted by the smell of trash and dude, found Kiba's room. Daring to venture further into the room Naruto had to stop carefully around the mess, not unlike his own room, he found the room was littered with clothes, meals of a time passed, and...bodybuilder magazines? Momentarily confused Naruto then remembered his occasional brief encounters with the head of the Inuzuka clan, "Maybe it's best not to go in the room of such a...fierce woman" Naruto thought before walking the rest of the hall. Looking around Naruto found the hallway had terminated leading into a large kitchen/dining space, clearly evidenced by the fridge, stove, and litany of cabinets he, wildly, assumed were full of dog treats and bacon.

Making his way across the room Naruto found another hallway on the other side, clearly linking the home into it's circular shape, but this hall had only one door. Entering the room Naruto what found what must be the largest area in the complex, with several kennels in the back, and filled with an array of training equipment for the dogs. His curiosity satisfied, Naruto was about to head out the door when the smallest and faintest of glints in the corner caught his eye. When he checked the corner he found an, almost entirely hidden, cabinet filled with several identical bottles of...food pills? Pocketing a bottle to ask Kiba about later, Naruto proceeded down the hall winding up in the entryway/ living room again. With the pills positively burning a hole in his pocket Naruto sat on the floor in front of Kiba's sleeping form and waited. About a minute passed before Kiba began to look annoyed, sensing Naruto's presence, and opened his eyes angrily snapping "What?!"

"What are these?" Naruto asked, unfazed and holding up the bottle of pills.

As if a flip had been switched, Kiba snatched the bottle from Naruto and jumped to the other side of the room "Where did you get these?!" he yelled.

"In, in, in, in the dog's training room." Naruto stuttered, taken aback. "What's the big deal?"

With a deep breath Kiba explained "These are special food pills that only we Inuzuka's are supposed to know about."

"Uh huh, go on." Naruto pressed.

"They're given to the puppies to help them grow." Kiba continued "Now please drop it."

Naruto, clearly having no such intention, asked "If that's it than why'd you freak out so much?"

"Look I swear that's all the more there is to it," Kiba insisted "the rules are just very strict. Humans are never allowed to take one."

"Well why not?" Naruto asked unsatisfied.

"I don't know they're just not!" Kiba said, becoming annoyed.

"Well let's find out!" Naruto said, eager to try something stupid, "They can't be that dangerous if they're for puppies."

"Hell no!" Kiba said, turning away to return the bottle.

"Fine," Naruto huffed "I just though you were supposed to be a dog ninja not a chicken ninja."

With that...

He could simply go and explore around the village, after all such an enormous village that had been founded so long ago must hold some interesting secrets! With that Naruto set off on a trek along Konoha's outskirts, combing every shadow he found like an overeager child looking for hidden treasure. Nearly an hour of this though was beginning to dampen Naruto's spirits as time after time the village's shadowy corners proved to be filled not with secrets, but a simple lack of sunlight. "Damn it," Naruto huffed kicking a stone aimlessly into a patch of grass, to his surprise though the stone struck something that sounded distinctly wooden. "What do we have here?" Naruto asked no one in particular, interest piqued by this out of place sound as he began inspecting the area where the stone landed.

To his shock Naruto found a hidden hatch that bore the Uzumaki crest "What in the..." Naruto trailed off as he ventured down into this mysterious bunker. What he found was a room that was filled with ceremonial masks, antique weaponry, several jam packed bookcases, and a handful of bizarre scrolls. As the ninja looked around the room he found himself completely bewildered by what all this apparently important junk was or why it was even important.

Suddenly Kurama decided to make his opinion known as he spoke with an uncharacteristic fascination "Naruto, do you know what you just found?"

"It just looks like a bunch of junk..." Naruto said to Kurama sounding unimpressed.

"You idiot," the fox chastised, "This is the Uzumaki's long lost vault, who knows what kind of secrets are down here kid!"

"You sound really impressed by all this crap," Naruto chuckled, not used to the fox being so interested in...well...anything.

"Shut it twerp!" Kurama snapped, then, as if karma in motion, Naruto tripped over some clutter and had the life scared out of him when a strange puppet fell on him, causing him to scream like a little girl. "Suits you right for laughing," Kurama huffed.

"I still don't get it, what's so special about all this Kurama?" Naruto asked, dusting himself off.

"Well if you actually read one of the scrolls instead of just staring at them you'd see," Kurama pointed out.

"Alright, alright, don't get your tails in a knot," Naruto said as he approached an ornate case that housed three elaborate looking scrolls.

Boruto moved his head up, smashing his hands into the tiny specks of trees and earth. Eyes closed again as he embraced the coming transformation

Uncontrollable growing and the reverse master!
Naruto makes all he desires real
133.content:
*Creak* "Sorry Naruto. Can't let you leave just yet."

Naruto looked on as Shikamaru entered. A frown plastered on his face as he let out a *SIGH* at his assistants arrival.

Naruto squinted his eyes. "I was hoping to avoid the work you had planned."

"Should have been faster in escaping". There wasn't any rudeness, his tone seeped with displeasure at the work as well.

"Very well. Hopefully those coots will finally let me have some spare time afterwards. Or they'll wish they hadn't upset their Kage." Empty threats, but it made him feel better as he moved to sit down at the desk, not even bothering with the coat.

"Alright bring whatever hours of work it is here." His words were sharp with anger, but he wasn't mad at Shikamaru. No he was angry at all those who give him endless piles of paperwork. Even the Third and Fourth didn't have things so bad.

"They want you to examine and find out what" he entered his jack, pulling from an inside pocket a scroll "Is in this scroll."

"...Shouldn't this be left to the experts in unlocking hidden scroll information?"

"It should, but apparently they're all busy. So they asked you to shoulder the burden and use your ability to feel chakra to find the first clue to unlock the damn thing".

"Tsk. I had so many things I wanted to do this weekend."

"Me as well. It's such a drag being forced to do this work."

"You're staying?"

"Yeah.They forced you to do this so I should help you. Least I can do is get you anything you need."

Naruto's lips curled upwards "Thanks. Can always believe in you to help even with this nightmare of work to do."

Smirking as well. The goateed man scratched his cheek. "Always happy to spend time with the Hokage I chose to serve."

"Well then let me open this and see what's going on...."

Opening the scroll, he closed eyes and concentrated as his body was awash in black and gold fire. The magic energy of chakra wrapping across his body. Looking as if he could set it all aflame.

Examining the scroll for over several hours, he found....

"Nothing."

"Nothing?"

"Nothing. Not a damn clue or bit of chakra for where to pry open first!" As he moved to close it, a *FLASH* of symbols appeared on the scroll, followed by them appearing on the Seventh Hokage's eyes, only to vanish as quickly as they came. Naruto oblivious as he shut it and dropped it to the ground.

"Whoops." Lies. He didn't care for once. He was so stressed out.

"Damn. Wasted our *YAWN* time for nothing" Shikamaru yawned. Bored out of his mind waiting, but not letting himself sleep or relax as he waited on Naruto hand and foot. Something Naruto liked, admittedly.

"Well we have to stay here a couple more hours right?" Shikamaru nodded in annoyance. "What do you want to do?"

"How bout I get you some proper food instead of snacks?"

"That'd be nice. Thanks Shikamaru."

"No problem Naruto."

As Shikamaru turned to walk, something happened as the marks engrave on Naruto's eye appeared, glowing before turning invisible.

1. Naruto looks in a window, his reflecting back as he suddenly grows huge and incredibly horny. Shikamaru is here to service his every need~

2. Naruto and Shikamaru panic as Shikamaru suddenly grows as big as the ceiling and incredibly ripped. His eyes causing growth without his consent! Not only that, suddenly Shikamaru calls him master and wants Naruto to serve his God King, and Naruto feels compelled too!?

3. Thinking Shikamaru has a nice ass and could look sexier, Shikamaru begins to grow till his clothes are on the point of shredding. Naruto even thinks he should flirt more, causing Shikamaru to flirt. All that Naruto wishes for comes true, and in doing so affects him so he wants to cause more changes
133.title: All the Power In His Hands

choices: Naruto decides to grow, wanting Konohamaru to worship him like last time!

The two decide to eat every last drop of food in Ichiraku Ramen. Growing fast!
134.content:
A heavy *SLAM* was heard as a brown haired Jonin entered "Big bro!"

Startled, Naruto body jumped only a little "Gah! Konohamaru!? What's the matter?"

"You won't believe this. That sake store we tried a year ago is opening a branch here!"

At those words Naruto's eyes widened. "The Great Cosmic Daidarabotchi Spirits!?" A smile crossed his face, drool dripped a little from his mouth. "I can't believe it!"

"Believe it!" Konohamaru rushed to Naruto's side by the desk in a flash! Several papers neatly stacked flying off their completed piles slowly to the floor, but ignored as the the two became giddy.

That is until Naruto remembered he lacked the ''considerable'' funds to get one. "Ah but I don't have the money at the moment." Crestfallen, he nearly slumped back into his chair before Konohamaru opened his wallet, reveals loads of money.

"I gotcha covered. I was saving so we can go again one day and try that exquisite flavor once again."

"Thanks Konohamaru. I was afraid we wouldn't get to enjoy it like we got to previously."

For a moment both paused, faces red as they let out a tiny whistle. Almost as if keeping something from any prying ears. Silence lasted only a few moments before stopped, Naruto getting up.

"What are we waiting for? Let's go!" Moving out of the way of his Kage, Naruto lead them both to the exit of his office. His quick pace making clear how excited he was to try this drink of the past as Konohamaru followed at the same speed.

"Its next to Ichiraku Ramen! kay' boss?" It's been a long time since he called Naruto that, well actually a year, which resulted in the tightening of Naruto's shorts as Naruto remembered.

"H-heh...wouldn't mind a bite to eat after we get our fill of some good booze."

=====

Soon the two had arrived at Ichiraku Ramen. The updated restaurant had a small stall with no visitors next to it. Wood with carved paintings on the side of great mountains. No one was there tending the small stand, but the two knew exactly what to do.

Grabbing out every bit of cash and putting it on the table, Konohamaru smirked.

"We'll take four bottles of the Ol'Gods please!"

With a *Hum* red markings of a Jutsu appeared up below on the wood, making the money disappear with a *PUFF*. Disappearing red marks followed by the emergence of four blue when a *PUFF* of four black bottles appeared. Depicting a great giant of earth on the side.of each.

Grabbing one each, both happily *POP* the cork off.

"Cheers Naruto!"
"Cheers Konohamaru!"

The two took a swig of their bottles, a deep rich aroma the likes of which no alcohol has ever been able to compete with made its journey down their throats. The taste was so great both knew they had to stop lest they waste it all.

"Ahh!"

Wiping his lips with his sleeve, Konohamaru smiled. "You don't usually go out drinking with me boss. So when we get the chance I do love it."

"He...it's usually Kiba. You really should come some time."

"Nah. I want us to hang out with just us. Or I visit you and Boruto. Seeing both of you is always great." The brown eyed Ninja stared intently at Naruto. The drink already setting in.

"So want me to summon these away for later?"
"Yes please! I want entire years of the upcoming fun we'll have with my village~"
"As expected of my boss!" Pulling out a scroll and performing a summoning jutsu, the four bottles disappeared in a *BOOM* of smoke.

"Now how should we start our fun this time~


=====Previous Year=====
Konohamaru had been Naruto's guard during a visit to the Land of Iron to meet General Mifune for a treaty between the five great countries and their allies.

The two came across a special little stand that sold alcohol, lost in the cold, each swig of the drink causing big side effects that led to two very grown ninja embracing their mischievous side for months on end. Returning to "normal" after enough was enough. Everything ruined returned to the way it was before.

Well not quite. Naruto and Konohamaru did get a few inches taller and easily a dozen pounds in muscle. But who'd notice such a change in a world returned to its Status Quo?
